ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Gold Plated Koshigitana
ygData.msgSnippet: my guild feels they are pretty crappy too.  they have only gone to rogue twinks til they get something better (bone razor, crystalline spear) or warriors
ygData.messageBody:
my guild feels they are pretty crappy too. they have only gone to rogue
twinks til they get something better (bone razor, crystalline spear) or
warriors trying to raise their piercing skill. and it is assigned low value
for our points system (and dropped a hell of a lot off nagafen). so i guess
yes, it is considered crappy for a dragon loot and compared to planar
weapons.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
> This is a crappy weapon? It has one of the best
> damage/delays in the game! I guess if you compare it
> to a planar weapon but still! it is 9/25.
>
> Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
> 37th level bard
